pyyabc.io package¶

Submodules¶

pyyabc.io.ase module¶

pyyabc.io.ase.read(ase_atoms)[source]¶
pyyabc.io.ase.write(cell)[source]¶

pyyabc.io.vasp module¶

pyyabc.io.vasp.read_vasp(filename='POSCAR')[source]¶

Import POSCAR/CONTCAR or filename with .vasp suffix

parameter: filename: string, the filename

return: Cell object.

pyyabc.io.vasp.write_vasp(cell, filename='POSCAR', suffix='.vasp', long_format=True)[source]¶
write vasp POSCAR type into file, vasp5 format only.
always write atoms sorted POSCAR.

parameters:

cell: Cell object, the Cell that you wanna write into vasp POSCAR. filename: string, filename of output file, default=’POSCAR’ suffix: string, suffix of filename, default=’.vasp’ long_format: bool, if True format %.16f will be write, else %.6f

ref: https://gitlab.com/ase/ase/blob/master/ase/io/vasp.py

if optional parameters (filename and suffix) are not set, the filename will be ‘POSCAR.vasp’

pyyabc.io.xyz module¶

pyyabc.io.xyz.read_vasp(filename='XYZ')[source]¶

Import filename with .xyz suffix

parameter: filename: string, the filename

return: Molecule object.

pyyabc.io.xyz.write_vasp(mol, filename='XYZ', suffix='.xyz', long_format=True)[source]¶

write xyz type into file. always write atoms sorted xyz file.

parameters:

mol: Molecule object, the Molecule that you wanna write into xyz. filename: string, filename of output file, default=’XYZ’ suffix: string, suffix of filename, default=’.xyz’ long_format: bool, if True format %.16f will be write, else %.6f

ref: https://gitlab.com/ase/ase/blob/master/ase/io/vasp.py

if optional parameters (filename and suffix) are not set, the filename will be ‘XYZ.xyz’
